name: Neptune Quest 2: ULTRA
description:
A direct sequel to Neptune Quest's true ending.

Play as Neptune, the human adventurer from the Ultradimension, as she travels with her trusty companion Croire across the vast world of Dragon Quest 2's Torland.  Meet and befriend new characters, reunite with your traveling friend Uzume, and figure out the meaning behind the sudden change in the timeline before it's too late.

Currently only chapter 1 is complete.  This game is actively being developed.

This game is made using RPG Maker VX Ace.  It features an active combat system that incorporates dodging. blocking and similar mechanics; original and re-imagined maps from Dragon Quest 2; a full crafting and upgrade system; fleshed-out characters with interpersonal relationships; and consequences for failure.

Please support the official games and franchises - Dragon Quest, Neptunia, and any other games that are showcased here.
